description.en:
To carry out economic activity in Ecuador, an organisation must have a unique taxpayer identifier (RUC). Both individuals and organisations may hold a taxpayer identifier.

The Superintendency of Companies provides a search of companies, with each record showing their RUC.

access.onlineAccessDetails: An online search with company details is available from the Superintendency of Companies.
access.guidanceOnLocatingIds:
The portal at http://www.supercias.gob.ec/portalinformacion/portal/ provides links to the Directorio de Companias, which has a search facility.

The RUC is provided in the results.

data.dataAccessDetails: An export of search results is available through the portal.
